metadata.synopsis: A goblin raider before/after the raid on the druid grove.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
1.text: Thought their horns would be bigger. What's the use if ya can't even drink from 'em?

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
2.text: Oh look, we missed a teef in all the slaughter!
2.context: NodeContext: Mock surprise/joy at the prospect of more killing - but he knows you're an ally, you just LOOK like the enemy.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
0.text: Just funnin', mate. We know you're one of us. Cold-blooded killer.
0.context: NodeContext: As if thumping you on the arm playfully, a joke between friends. Last line is said with respect - you're complicit in the slaughter of your own kind.

3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
3.text: Drow says we can do what we want with the corpses. Gonna take their horns as trophies!
